titles.title: A resolution reaffirming a strong commitment to United States producers and commodities made in the United States.
A resolution reaffirming a strong commitment to United States producers and commodities made in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses that the Senate urges the President to require the U.S. Trade Representative to enter into the trade negotiations necessary to implement mandatory country-of-origin labeling for beef, in order to allow consumers to make an informed and free choice about where their food comes from.
